post.body:
There are two Halloweens, a wholesome one where you take kids Trick-or-Treating and an adult one where college students dress up in slutty costumes and get wasted. We don't take kids to the second Halloween, so why would anyone bring them to the "adult" Pride event?

It could be a big picnic at the park where you listen to Elton John or something.
post.body_html:
There are two Halloweens, a wholesome one where you take kids Trick-or-Treating and an adult one where college students dress up in slutty costumes and get wasted. We don't take kids to the second Halloween, so why would anyone bring them to the "adult" Pride event?

It could be a big picnic at the park where you listen to Elton John or something.

post.body: You did it first. The religious baker who wanted to be left alone, you just had to attack him and scream in his face and force him to bend to your demands. Maybe, just maybe, they wouldn't associate such negative attributes with gays if you didn't constantly shove it in their face. No, *you* pushed them over the edge, to scorning it and now to wanting to criminalize it. No one hated black people until you who falsely speak for them burned and looted Minneapolis for days straight. Thanks to *you*, now they really are racist, because you made them think this is what black people do. Maybe they wouldn't be so uncomfortable with trans people if it weren't for you fighting mostly for access to the womens' bathroom for people who still have a penis, athletes blatantly cheating by switching to the weaker team, and unbelievable college snowflakes freaking out about because someone dared "assume their gender". And then you pushed it even further, and now you've got them insisting that everyone follow defined gender roles and wanting to repeal the 19th. Maybe they would even be willing to get along you, but you said no, and there's definitely no going back now. Think about it, if a bunch of crazy people are constantly screaming about something relentlessly, you're going to start loathing said thing, even if you otherwise would've loved it. And those crazy people are what you are. Good job, you've managed to turn half the country against everything it once believed in to destroy you and everything you've made them associate with you. But hey, at least you can pull out your precious victim card, which was probably the plan all along!

parent.body:
Don't believe it, post a picture holding a piece of paper with my username for evidence. 

However, your probable lies aside, i will give you some sympathy for the scenario of being bad at everything you like because that is my situation. I'm not good at anything but i have to pass the time somehow... but i can't tell anyone around me about my interests because i suck.  

Yes, i like to play video games, no, i'm not at world tournament levels.

yes, i like to write for my own amusement. No, i'm not writing new york times best sellers that will get a netflix series. 

yes, i like to play board games. No, i'm not a russian grandmaster at chess. 

people are so annoying, the internet ruined society. Now that we are blasted everyday with the most extreme of every activity; nobody is impressed except by the top 1% of the 1%.

post.body:
The 12th century Tibetan Buddhist master Gampopa said:

>Sexual misconduct has three categories: sex proscribed by family ties, sex proscribed by belonging to someone else, and sex proscribed due to religious factors. The first of these is intercourse with parents, siblings, and so forth [blood relations]. The second is intercourse with someone committed to another person or belonging to a monarch. The third includes five areas of improper intercourse because of organs involved, place, time, degree, or manner. Inappropriate organs refers to oral or anal intercourse. An inappropriate place is in the proximity of a guru, temple, stupa, or large gathering. Inappropriate times are those when lay precepts are being observed, during pregnancy, while the mother is breastfeeding, or during daylight hours. An inappropriate degree is five or more times consecutively. Inappropriate forms of intercourse are the likes of rape and anal or oral intercourse with a person of the same sex or with a hermaphrodite.

body:
> fairy tales of a long-gone desert tribe of savages obsessed with getting women pregnant told them they should do.

The older books expose that the earlier Israelites and Judahites knew nothing of those rules. Their faith was repeatedly corrupted by pagan and later Babylonian influence as is recorded in Jeremiah 7-8 and eventually degraded into religious cults as usual. The paganism in pre-exilic times was so rampant that historians understandably assume it came first. Then the elites saw in Babylon that a monotheist god didn't have to be the real one, so they stopped being as fond of paganism.

It happened again with Christianity, with the early believers rejecting such doctrines and then an organized church formed shortly afterwards, fraudulently and deceptively promoting them again, and making sure the people remained in line and blindly following the state and culture.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

parent.body:
Science didn't change. The people pretending to do science changed and actually started observing what people and animals *actually do* instead of what the fairy tales of a long-gone desert tribe of savages obsessed with getting women pregnant told them they should do.

Your "professionals" included [idiots who railed against "the solitary vice"](https://bust.com/sex/16855-the-solitary-vice-victorian-views-on-masturbation.html), freaks who [invented torture devices](https://www.vintag.es/2018/05/anti-masturbation-devices.html) to use [on children](https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/the-brutal-anti-masturbation-devices-of-the-victorian-era/BA3ABBTE2RP3LBY7BOEKHYKVMI/), and some sick fucks like [Isaac Baker Brown](https://theconversation.com/the-rise-and-fall-of-fgm-in-victorian-london-38327).

Fortunately for the women of England, most doctors were clueless, self-obsessed gits who had no clue that the clitoris even existed, otherwise such barbarism would have been much more common.

post.body:
The word "gay" means cheerful or otherwise to be quite happy.

It does not refer to two men attempting to have "sex", a biological impossibility between two of the same sex.

This is my push to, in my humble opinion, correct our grammar based on God's word.

"Gay" means sodomite, "Lesbian" means sodomite, "Bisexual" means sodomite, "Trans" means mentally deranged or indoctrinated sodomite.

When framed like this, the "LGBT+" mob is simply encouraging sodomy and mental illness.

Turn off the computer, leave the phone at home, and go outside and enjoy God's creation free from the kingdom of Sodom that is the  mainstream internet.

The word "gay" means cheerful or otherwise to be quite happy.

It does not refer to two men attempting to have "sex", a biological impossibility between two of the same sex.

This is my push to, in my humble opinion, correct our grammar based on God's word.

"Gay" means sodomite, "Lesbian" means sodomite, "Bisexual" means sodomite, "Trans" means mentally deranged or indoctrinated sodomite.

When framed like this, the "LGBT+" mob is simply encouraging sodomy and mental illness.

Turn off the computer, leave the phone at home, and go outside and enjoy God's creation free from the kingdom of Sodom that is the mainstream internet.
post.title: Call them by their name: Sodomites.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

guild.name: Christianity

post.body:
https://infogalactic.com/info/Americanism_(heresy)

> Coined in the nineteenth century, in Roman Catholic use the term Americanism referred to a group of related views, claimed to be heresies, tending to the endorsement of the separation of church and state, which were alleged to be prevalent among some American Catholics. European "continental conservative" (see Ancien Régime) clerics thought they detected signs of modernism or classical liberalism of the sort the Pope had condemned in the Syllabus of Errors in 1864. They feared that these doctrines were held by and taught by many members of the Catholic hierarchy in the United States in the 1890s. Catholic leaders in the U.S., however, denied that they held these views.[1]

> The Americanist heresy is characterized as an insistence upon individual initiative which the Vatican judged to be incompatible with what was considered to be a fundamental principle of Catholicism: obedience to authority. Moreover, the continental conservatives were anti-republicans who distrusted and disliked the democratic ideas that were dominant in America.[2]

> Pope Leo XIII wrote against these ideas in his encyclical Testem benevolentiae nostrae to Cardinal James Gibbons. In 1898, Leo XIII lamented an America where church and state are "dissevered and divorced" and wrote of his preference for a closer relationship between the Catholic Church and the State along European lines.[3]

> The long-term result was that the Irish Catholics who largely controlled the Catholic Church in the United States increasingly demonstrated their total loyalty to the Pope, and traces of liberal thought in the Catholic colleges were suppressed. At bottom it was a cultural conflict, as the continental conservative Europeans, angered at the heavy attacks on the Catholic church in Germany, France and other countries, did not appreciate the active individualism, self-confidence, and optimism of the American church.[4]

[Testem Benevolentia Nostrae (Infogalactic)](https://infogalactic.com/info/Testem_benevolentiae_nostrae)

[Full Text Of Testem Benevolentia Nostrae](https://www.papalencyclicals.net/Leo13/l13teste.htm)

[Catholic Encylopedia entry on encyclical](https://www.newadvent.org/cathen/14537a.htm)
post.body_html:
https://infogalactic.com/info/Americanism_(heresy)

Coined in the nineteenth century, in Roman Catholic use the term Americanism referred to a group of related views, claimed to be heresies, tending to the endorsement of the separation of church and state, which were alleged to be prevalent among some American Catholics. European "continental conservative" (see Ancien Régime) clerics thought they detected signs of modernism or classical liberalism of the sort the Pope had condemned in the Syllabus of Errors in 1864. They feared that these doctrines were held by and taught by many members of the Catholic hierarchy in the United States in the 1890s. Catholic leaders in the U.S., however, denied that they held these views.[1]

The Americanist heresy is characterized as an insistence upon individual initiative which the Vatican judged to be incompatible with what was considered to be a fundamental principle of Catholicism: obedience to authority. Moreover, the continental conservatives were anti-republicans who distrusted and disliked the democratic ideas that were dominant in America.[2]

Pope Leo XIII wrote against these ideas in his encyclical Testem benevolentiae nostrae to Cardinal James Gibbons. In 1898, Leo XIII lamented an America where church and state are "dissevered and divorced" and wrote of his preference for a closer relationship between the Catholic Church and the State along European lines.[3]

The long-term result was that the Irish Catholics who largely controlled the Catholic Church in the United States increasingly demonstrated their total loyalty to the Pope, and traces of liberal thought in the Catholic colleges were suppressed. At bottom it was a cultural conflict, as the continental conservative Europeans, angered at the heavy attacks on the Catholic church in Germany, France and other countries, did not appreciate the active individualism, self-confidence, and optimism of the American church.[4]

Testem Benevolentia Nostrae (Infogalactic)

Full Text Of Testem Benevolentia Nostrae

Catholic Encylopedia entry on encyclical
post.title: Americanism (Heresy)
